website_summaries.verdict: The Surface Pro 7 is another solid iteration of Microsoft's flagship Windows-tablet 2-in-1, elevated this time by worthy upgrades in the form of a USB-C port and peppy Ice Lake CPUs.
cons: Just two ports, and no Thunderbolt 3 support

customer_reviews.title: It's a Con.
customer_reviews.text: It's a con. How can it be a laptop and a tablet when you have to pay EXTRA for a keyboard. Misleading advertising and a con.
customer_reviews.author: Guest909

customer_reviews.title: Microsoft debut
customer_reviews.text: With 5 years spent with my Tab S2 and After spending weeks of deciding on my next big Tablet /Laptop. Spilt between this, the pro 6, and Tab S6 I finally decided on this. Happy with my choice, love the look, the feel and size of this. Though I would say overpriced I don't regret my choice and i can't get enough of this. One negative I will say is I don't get much from the advertised battery life, bearing in mind I have alot of media usage.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Richards

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE! (G and R Sales) US Plug Cable - Warranty already started 11 months left
customer_reviews.text: I received my product with the US plug power cord, and a cheap stiff UK cord outside the box, which is not the same soft material as the original. Also once registered the device, Microsoft showed that I had less than 11 months left of warranty, so I lost one full month of warranty for no apparent reason, I do not recommend to buy from G and R Sales.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. Salvatori

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant PC windows bugs let it down
customer_reviews.text: If you have a sp6 don't bother to upgrade as theres barley any difference however this is my first surface its fast beautifully built but expensive I brought mine for photo edits as I'm a pro photographer and for digital art it handles these with ease instant on helps make it feel like a tablet and it feels fast all the time only thing that let's it down are some of the software bugs but that's due to windows rather then the tablet and iv had it a couple of months now and there are less and less bugs if you need a portable PC were u can take off the keyboard this is the best out there
customer_reviews.author: steve barnes

customer_reviews.title: It's Good, But....
customer_reviews.text: As an everyday computer it does the job nicely. The screen looks great, it's extremely portable, and it's very responsive for average computing needs. Especially with the new Ice Lake processor in it. However, if you're an artist/user of Photoshop it can be very slow and has performance issues. so, as an artist I wouldn't recommend this version of the machine, I'd go for the i7 or the 16GB version. That's the only reason I returned it. If you're going to use it for light productivity, social media, and watching Netflix etc on, then it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Villan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Received the machine which ran relatively well, Very smooth. Ordered all the extras (stylus, mouse,keyboard etc) and before they were all delivered it crashed. Refusing to turn on and showing the windows logo. I returned it and has since been lost. I have spoken to customer services 5+ times being told each time that I will have to wait 24/48 hours for a response. I don't know whats worse; the product or customer service? I received an item which wasn't mine with my product report on but someone elses address so my cpu is clearly lost as is this persons property. Absolutely useless
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Slim and very portable, packed with features
customer_reviews.text: The Uk 3 pin plug for the charger has sharp and protruding pins that can scratch and damage the surface of the Surface or carrying case., and occupies a lot of space. A 2 pin EU charger and iBlock cube universal adapter is the answer, and this adapter (35W) also has 2 USB-C sockets and a USB-C to USB-C cable in addition to the universal plug socket which gives an alternative way of charging the Surface. To make full use of it (as a beginner), I needed to buy a Pro 7 user guide and 'Windows for Dummies', and still am struggling at times.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Webb-Peploe

customer_reviews.title: Battery life
customer_reviews.text: Battery life not as good as I thought, about 3.5hrs on full brightness, but overall a good piece of kit
customer_reviews.author: ruru

customer_reviews.title: It was faulty
customer_reviews.text: It was faulty so I sent this back, it arrived a week ago and I have heard nothing, not even an 'acknowledgement of receipt and please bear with us' email. For such an expensive item this is not great customer service. It overheated on 3 occasions in the month I had it, switching itself off for several days at a time. In addition the screen flicked between very bright and dark. Not what you'd expect from a brand new Microsoft product. I run my business from home and desperately need to function properly and need a replacement or refund urgently.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky Botterill

customer_reviews.title: Brill
customer_reviews.text: Cool little device. Battery life would be the weakest point of the device. Other than that, it's a fast machine and is great for Photoshop use.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Apsey

customer_reviews.title: Good hardware design
customer_reviews.text: The hardware design is excellent but still problems with software programming. A stand alone magnetic coupling keyboard is a must. Otherwise Good useful product. Battery life very good recharges quickly. To charge in a car you need a USB-c outlet that gives you a minimum of 65 watts output.
customer_reviews.author: Les S.

customer_reviews.title: FAST DELIVERY
customer_reviews.text: my old computer, although still in opertion but owing to disablility I required something that was mobile. this machine is just what I required.
customer_reviews.author: LYBRY

customer_reviews.title: Refund
customer_reviews.text: I returned this 3 weeks ago as it was not suitable for me. I am still awaiting refund.
customer_reviews.author: Minna

customer_reviews.title: Returned Item
customer_reviews.text: Had to return item due a fault. It was freezing and glitching. It was a brand new tablet and not a refurbished tablet.
customer_reviews.author: CherylBda

customer_reviews.title: The best Laptop I've ever owned, and technically it's a tablet.
customer_reviews.text: The surface pro series has always been great. But the price for the i5 8g ram version is so cheap now and it's lightning fast. And it now finally has USB-C!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Thomas Mccaughley

customer_reviews.title: Effective and Versatile
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting more battery Life... That's the only issue... Very Efficient and Versatile
customer_reviews.author: Sandro Vieira

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop with a touch screen
customer_reviews.text: Ideal lightweight and fully usable laptop or large tablet. Highly recommended. Picked up a Surface keyboard at the same time, backlit and easy to use too.
customer_reviews.author: Metta.UK

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Not overly sure on battery life been fantastic but still need to give it a full charge. Great value for money as I was lucky enough to get it on prime day.
customer_reviews.author: LucyG

customer_reviews.title: 8 days.. and already faulty.
customer_reviews.text: Had the device 8 days ... And already it has a fault. Flickering display and the general speed of the decide and userability has reduced. Now I have to go through the pain of returning it to see if it can be repaired before they replace it. I've heard these issues are common with the Surface, i soon found that out when I was googling for information!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Ward

customer_reviews.title: Light and flexible.
customer_reviews.text: Needed new PC and the fact that it's a tablet too is just great. Quick enough processor for my use.
customer_reviews.author: Mr G J F

customer_reviews.title: Very good tablet!
customer_reviews.text: Got this during the Prime sales for a good price! Works well with my surface keyboard now!
customer_reviews.author: Wong Chun Yuan

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Ordered my Surface Pro 7 on the Amazon days at a great price and was delivered safely in no time at all. A month in and very happy with my purchase 😊
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Decent Tablet Laptop Combi
customer_reviews.text: Works well, has its moments as its a tablet that fights to be in laptop mode at times but in all, decent piece of kit
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas B.

customer_reviews.title: Better value for money than an iPad Pro but...
customer_reviews.text: This is not a tablet, it's a laptop with no keyboard, it's as simple as that!!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Melton

customer_reviews.title: Crashing fresh out of box
customer_reviews.text: Owned for less than 24 hrs and it has already crashed once. If this happens again i will return it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Godwin Mensah

customer_reviews.title: Prompt delivery
customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected. Arrived sooner than I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas C Roworth

customer_reviews.title: This is not worth  > £1000. Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Massive scam, the computer freezes very often and gets incredibly hot. Overall its very slow you can get good speeds for about 5 minutes but on heavy usage, like me, the computer gets super hot and fails. Spend your money on a decent laptop or even better a desktop which will run all your apps 5 times faster. Only credit is portability but due to how the pen magnetically attaches many times it has fallen off and I have found myself late for something because I struggle to find it. Along with this I have barely used it solely as a tablet and due to its huge size I dont see why I would.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: System problems - Blue stop screen nightmare
customer_reviews.text: Looked great. Worked for 10 days and then started having regular blue screen stop crashes which even a four hour call with Microsoft could n't fix. I have sent it back to Amazon and will not buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Wauchope

customer_reviews.title: Avoid all surface devices.
customer_reviews.text: I would steer clear of any surface device, I bought the previous version, after a year and a half Microsoft released an update which rendered the keyboard inoperable. They will not do anything about it because the warranty is only 1 year. Just not good enough for the price. Its still not working.
customer_reviews.author: Martin G. Houston

customer_reviews.title: Nice when it worked
customer_reviews.text: It was a nice unit but mine kept crashing so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Monkito

product_meta.title: Microsoft Surface Pro 7 12.3” Tablet (Platinum) - Intel 10th Gen Quad Core i5, 8GB RAM, 128GB SSD, Windows 10 Home, 2019 Edition
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Platinum Device| Size Name:i5, 8 GB, 128 GB| Style Name:Device Only


Surface Pro 7 adapts to you, instantly transforming from laptop to tablet to portable studio. Pair with a colourful Surface Type Cover and Surface Pen to complete your experience (Accessories sold separately).



Laptop Mode – Open the built-in kickstand and add our signature type cover for a full laptop experience.



Studio Mode – Lower the kickstand for the ideal 15-degree writing and drawing angle with Surface pen (sold separately).



Tablet Mode – Close the kickstand and remove or fold the type cover back for a powerful, stand-alone Intel tablet.



Your Laptop, your way - Now it’s easier than ever to work and play your way virtually anywhere. With laptop-to-tablet versatility, plus better connectivity with both USB-C and USB-A ports, Surface Pro 7 is an ultra-light standout that adapts to you. Adjust the kickstand and choose how you interact with type, touch, or Surface Pen to connect, create, and get comfortable.



Next-gen power to fuel your ideas - Wherever you go, and whatever you do, next-generation Surface Pro 7 stands ready to take your ideas to the next level. With its multitasking, laptop-class Intel Core processor, improved graphics, fast charging, all-day battery, 1 and instant on, you can get back to work right now, tonight or tomorrow — whenever inspiration strikes.



Express yourself - Personalise Surface Pro 7 with a choice of two classic colours — platinum or matte black. Sketch, write, and erase naturally on the interactive touchscreen with Surface Pen. Make it a full laptop experience with our signature type cover and Surface Arc mouse, all in a fresh choice of coordinating colors. Be heard loud and clear, whether in conference calls or using voice dictation in office apps with enhanced dual far-field studio mics. And, get back to work when inspiration strikes with wake on open. Accessories sold separately.



Do more with the Windows you know - Surface Pro 7 comes with Windows 10 Home, so you can get productive right away and enjoy familiar features like password-free Windows Hello sign-in. Create your best work with Office 365 on Windows. And, keep photos, files, and videos safe in the cloud and access them across your devices with integrated OneDrive.




BOX CONTAINS
Surface Pro 7 12.3", Power Supply, Quick Start Guide, Safety and warranty documents
feature_bullets: Next-gen laptop with the versatility of a studio and tablet, so you can type, touch, draw, write, work and play more naturally
A more powerful Pro, faster than Surface Pro 6, with a laptop-class Intel Core processor and improved graphics. Wireless: Wi-Fi 6: 802.11ax compatible, Bluetooth Wireless 5.0 technology
More ways to connect, with both USB-C and USB-A ports for connecting to displays, docking stations and more, as well as accessory charging
Standout design that will not weigh you down, ultra-slim and light Surface Pro 7 starts at just 771 g
Choose from two colours Platinum or Matte Black and pair with a signature type cover, surface arc mouse and surface pen (accessories sold separately)
All-day battery life up to 10.5 hours, plus the ability to go from empty to full faster, about 80 Percent in just over an hour
Other features: Windows 10 Home. High-resolution PixelSense display with touchscreen and fast, secured, password-free sign-in with facial recognition and Windows Hello
